WITH RECURSIVE category_tree AS ( SELECT id, parent_id, name, image, level, status, create_time, update_time, CAST(id AS CHAR(50)) AS path FROM category WHERE parent_id IS NULL OR parent_id = 0 UNION ALL SELECT c.id, c.parent_id, c.name, c.image, c.level, c.status, c.create_time, c.update_time, CONCAT(ct.path, ',', c.id) AS path FROM category c JOIN category_tree ct ON c.parent_id = ct.id ) SELECT * FROM category_tree ORDER BY path

WITH RECURSIVE category_path AS ( SELECT * FROM category WHERE id = #{categoryId} UNION ALL SELECT c.* FROM category c JOIN category_path cp ON c.id = cp.parent_id ) SELECT * FROM category_path ORDER BY level ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE category SET status = #{status}, update_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{categoryId}
